abstract: AT&T has added a disclaimer to a television commercial that some viewers have suggested may be based too closely on the work of the artists Christo and Jeanne-Claude.
snippet: AT&T has added a disclaimer to a television commercial that some viewers have suggested may be based too closely on the work of the artists Christo and Jeanne-Claude.
